text: at least six people have been reportedly
killed after a vehicle drove in two
pedestrians and cyclists in Manhattan in
New York a suspect has been arrested the
incident happened in the area of
Chambers and West streets in the
upmarket
Tribeca neighborhood it's being treated
as a terror attack let's go straight to
America now and speak to our
correspondent Jane O Brien
what more can you tell us Jane while we
are as you say getting reports that six
people are confirmed dead at least six
people and there are reports of multiple
injuries this is being treated as an
intentional attack although the police
say that clearly at this early stage in
the investigation there is no known
motive but certainly the the FBI is
treating it as a terrorist attack we do
now know that Home Depot a very large
DIY store here in the US has confirmed
that the truck involved in this was
actually a rental truck and one of their
rental trucks that's all they're saying
at the moment they haven't given any
more details as to who actually rented
it we do know that the driver entered
West Street which is a very busy road
running the length of Manhattan with a
bicycle path that is extremely popular
from Chambers Street and then drove into
these cyclists before he then fled on
foot now the reports that we're getting
was that he he left the vehicle
brandishing what appear to be imitation
firearms and was then shot by police
we're not sure of his condition we
believe that he is still alive police
say that they have no further details as
to who he was at the moment but we're
expecting some sort of update within the
next hour or so we also know that the
president Donald Trump has been briefed
he has said that his thoughts and
prayers are with all those affected and
the mayor of New York Bill de Blasio is
on his way to the sea
there's been a lot of reports on social
media Jane I just wonder if you can give
us a sense of what eye witnesses have
been saying well all these reports of
course can't be independently confirmed
as yet and that's always a danger with
social media
some people are merely repeating what
they've heard but the the sorts of
stories that we've been hearing both on
on network television and Facebook and
Twitter are scenes hearing multiple
gunshots eight to ten gunshots fired
people running screaming from the scene
and this van plowing into cyclists going
the wrong way up the bicycle lane before
he got out of the vehicle and appeared
to be running around some people said he
he appeared confused frightened he was
brandishing what appeared to be guns the
police believed that they were imitation
and he was then shot it's also I think
important to say that police aren't
looking for anybody else in connection
with this they say that the driver is at
the moment the only suspect so there are
no further reports of an armed shooter
on the loose in the area but as I said I
witness reports on Twitter on social
media they have to be confirmed they are
just that they are reports and we do
need to independently confirm them okay
Jamie we'll leave it there for now
